NK040(thi)015:2: rang gi spyi gtsug tu ma cig lab kyi sgron
NK040(thi)015:3: ma la 'khor grub thob gcod yul brgyud pa'i bla
NK040(thi)015:4: ma rnams kyis bskor nas bzhugs par bsam la /
NK040(thi)015:6: chos dbyings spros dang bral ba'i pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)015:7: pha rol phyin dang sh+aakya'i rgyal po dang //
NK040(thi)015:8: smra ba'i seng+ge dang ni 'phags ma sgrol //
NK040(thi)015:9: su kha sid+d+hi +aar+ya de ba dang //
NK040(thi)015:10: dam pa rgya gar bsod nams bla ma dang //
NK040(thi)015:11: ma cig lab sgron khu sgom chos seng dang //
NK040(thi)015:12: dol pa zang thal skya nag gcer bu dang //
NK040(thi)015:13: sangs rgyas rab ston rtog ldan dge slong dang //
NK040(thi)015:14: sangs rgyas gnyen ston zhen med ras pa dang //
NK040(thi)015:15: chos kyi seng+ge badz+ra sid+d+hi dang //
NK040(thi)015:16: pra dz+ny+aa gu ru rje btsun dpal 'bar ba //
NK040(thi)015:17: ga ga badz+ra shi la ke tu dang //
NK040(thi)015:18: dz+ny+aa na ke tu kun dga' 'bum pa dang //
NK040(thi)015:19: bsod nams 'bum pa rdo rje 'od zer dang //
NK040(thi)015:20: nam mkha' rdo rje nam mkha' blo gros dang //
NK040(thi)015:21: nag po rdo rje dbang drag rgya mtsho dang //
NK040(thi)015:22: chos skyong rgya mtsho klong gsal snying po dang //
NK040(thi)015:23: chos nyid rgya mtsho bkra shis phun tshogs dang //
NK040(thi)015:24: nam mkha' rgya mtsho dri med zhing skyong mgon //
NK040(thi)015:25: tshe dbang mchog grub nges don dbang po dang //
NK040(thi)015:26: 'gyur med bstan 'dzin chos kyi blo gros dang //
NK040(thi)015:27: kun bzang 'gyur med chos kyi rgya mtsho dang //
NK040(thi)015:28: rdo rje legs bshad rtsa ba'i bla ma sogs //
NK040(thi)015:29: zab don gcod yul brgyud pa'i bla ma la //
NK040(thi)015:30: gsol ba 'debs so bdag rgyud byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)015:31: bdag gzhan lus dang longs spyod dngos po kun //
NK040(thi)015:32: zhen pa med pa 'bul lo bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)015:33: rkyen ngan lam du long bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)015:34: thun mong mchog gi dngos grub myur thob nas //
NK040(thi)015:35: gdan thog gcig tu grol bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)015:36: ces gsol ba ba tabs pas /
